pages.text: $(l)Dave Villa$() is a structure generated in $(l)Overworld plains$(), where a $(#ff0000)crazy Dave and Penny$() will be spawned. At the same time, the lawn of the villa may spawn some plants.
Players can trade with Dave with $(#ff0000)Money$(), and Dave currently sells $(l)Energy limits and almanac and some Upgrade Cards$().$(br)Penny currently does not have AI and will be updated soon.
